original_text: And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down, and the haughtiness of men shall be made low: and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.
korean_text: 그 날에 자고한 자는 굴복되며 교만한 자는 낮아지고 여호와께서 홀로 높임을 받으실 것이요

sentences.original_text: And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down
and the haughtiness of men shall be made low
and the Lord alone shall be exalted
